actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Water and Power.

official_title: To authorize the Secretary of the Interior to participate in the construction and maintenance of facilities in Wichita, Kansas, to recharge the Equus Beds Aquifer, and for other purposes.
short_title: South Central Kansas Water Supply Preservation Act
subjects: Federal aid to water resources development

summary.text: South Central Kansas Water Supply Preservation Act - Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior, in order to demonstrate the feasibility of a full-scale groundwater recharge, storage, and recovery project and to ensure a safe and adequate water supply for the residents of Sedgwick County, Kansas, to participate with the City of Wichita in the construction and maintenance of facilities in Wichita to recharge the Equus Beds Aquifer.

titles.title: South Central Kansas Water Supply Preservation Act
To authorize the Secretary of the Interior to participate in the construction and maintenance of facilities in Wichita, Kansas, to recharge the Equus Beds Aquifer, and for other purposes.
